summary: Adds in the three word Unrelenting Force shout as an enchant, it can be learned from disenchanting the Fus Blade found in Whiterun.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds in the disenchantable \"Fus Blade\" a unique enchantment that acts as the three word force shout does launching your openents on contact. Once learned the enchant can be used on any other weapon you like. Only the additional fire damage is effected by lowering the enchantment slider, not the distance the target is launched. 

You can either add find the blade through help \"fus blade\" and adding it in via console commands, or you can find the blade in game behind smelter in whiterun next to warmaiden.
author: Stretch1one
